output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
The transfer function does not check if the target address is a contract, allowing transfers to contracts that can lead to loss of funds.
The transferFrom function does not check if the target address is a contract, allowing transfers to contracts that can lead to loss of funds.
The sell function has an integer overflow, allowing users to sell tokens at a price set by the owner, leading to a denial of service.
The claimThrone function has an integer overflow, allowing users to buy the contract, leading to a denial of service.
